title: ALLELUIA; TOBE CHUKWU N'ULO UKA YA

paragraph: Â¾By Rev. Fr. S. Anih, Arr & Harm.In Bigard
verses:
Tobe Chukwu n'ulo uka ya.
To benu ya n'elu ka elu.

Tobe Ya na olu ebube Ya,
Tobe Ya bu ike kasi ike.

Gbuhenu opi wee n'eto Ya,
Kpobanu ubo kpobanu une.

Kubanu aka gbabanu egwu,
Werenu ubo n'eto Chukwu.

Kubanu abia gbabanu egwu,
Were ubo n'eto Chukwu.

Kubanu oku igwen'etoYa,.
Kubanu mgbiligba wee too Ya.

The niile nke n'eme ume,
Tobe ChukwuAlleluia
